src:
Melayat di Kompleks Keraton, Gibran Bertemu Achmad Purnomo
01 Nov 2019, 07:10 by Ahmad Rafiq (Kontributor), Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Anak sulung Presiden Joko Widodo, Gibran Rakabuming bertemu dengan Wakil Wali Kota Surakarta Achmad Purnomo, Jum'at 1 November 2019. Saat ini keduanya diketahui tengah berebut tiket dari Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan (PDIP) untuk melaju dalam pemilihan kepala daerah tahun depan.
Mereka bertemu saat melayat di kompleks Keraton Kasunanan Surakarta. Salah satu adik kandung Paku Buwana XIII, GKR Galuh Kencana wafat dan hendak dimakamkan ke Imogiri.
Sebelum dimakamkan, jenazah GKR Galuh Kencana disemayamkan di Sasana Mulya. Saat Gibran tiba di rumah duka, Purnomo tengah menyampaikan pidato sambutan kepada para pelayat.
Mereka berdua bertemu dan bersalaman setelah jenazah diberangkatkan ke Imogiri. Mereka juga terlihat sempat berpelukan dan berbincang-bincang. "Kami sudah lama tidak bertemu," kata Gibran. Mereka bertemu terakhir saat pernikahan Kahiyang Ayu dan Bobby Nasution.
Sedangkan Purnomo menganggap pertemuan tersebut merupakan hal yang biasa. "Dulu kami sudah berkali-kali bertemu, hanya memang (bertemu) terakhir sudah lama," katanya.
Saat ini, keduanya tengah berebut restu dari PDIP untuk maju dalam pemilihan Wali Kota Surakarta yang berlangsung tahun depan. DPC PDIP Surakarta mengajukan nama pasangan Achmad Purnomo-Teguh Prakosa ke DPP PDIP.
Sedangkan Gibran yang gagal mendaftar melalui DPC PDIP Surakarta memilih langsung menemui Ketua Umum DPP PDIP Megawati di Jakarta. Hanya saja, dia belum bersedia mengungkap hasil pertemuan tersebut.
text:
Visiting the Keraton Complex, Gibran Meets Achmad Purnomo
01 Nov 2019, 07:10 by Ahmad Rafiq (Contributor), Juli Hantoro
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The eldest son of President Joko Widodo, Gibran Rakabuming met with Surakarta Deputy Mayor Achmad Purnomo, Friday 1 November 2019. Currently both of them are known to be fighting over tickets from the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle (PDIP) to advance in the head election area next year.
They met when they mourned the Surakarta Kasunanan Palace complex. One of Paku Buwana XIII's younger siblings, GKR Galuh Kencana died and was about to be buried in Imogiri.
Before being buried, GKR Galuh Kencana's body was buried at Sasana Mulya. When Gibran arrived at the funeral home, Purnomo was delivering a welcoming speech to the mourners.
The two of them met and shook hands after the body was dispatched to Imogiri. They were also seen hugging and chatting. "We haven't seen each other in a long time," Gibran said. They last met at the wedding of Kahiyang Ayu and Bobby Nasution.
Meanwhile, Purnomo considered the meeting to be normal. "In the past we had met many times, only indeed (the last meeting) had been a long time," he said.
At present, both are fighting for the blessing of the PDIP to advance in the election of the Mayor of Surakarta, which takes place next year. DPC PDIP Surakarta submitted the name of Achmad Purnomo-Teguh Prakosa's pair to the PDI-P DPP.
Meanwhile, Gibran who failed to register through the Surakarta PDIP DPC chose directly to meet with the Chairperson of the Megawati DPP PDIP in Jakarta. However, he was not yet willing to reveal the results of the meeting.
